text: The 1310s was the decade that started on January 1, 1310, and ended on December 31, 1319. It is distinct from the decade known as the 132th decade which began on January 1, 1311 and ended on December 31, 1320. == Events == * The Fraticelli pose a problem for the Roman Catholic church * In Europe, climate change leads to the Great Famine of 1315â€“1317
title: 1310s
